website_summaries.verdict: This is a budget-priced, midsize screen of good quality with a range of multimedia capabilities. It has bright dome lights and a sleek light gray look.
pros: Comes with compatible headphone set with padded ear covering and quality sound
Remote is more user-friendly than other models and could be easily operated by children
Multi-language on-screen display options and quality sound from external speakers
cons: Faulty sound system and other audio issues
Too difficult for the average person to install

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I had this put on my Tahoe and my worst nightmare came true. Turns out that the sound system was faulty at least thats what the techs from best buy said. When the movie is playing you can hear the terrible background sound of the engine! I had it checked twice and was told that it was the system. Long story it was gonna cost me more to fix the problem. I will never buy anything that seems to good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit
customer_reviews.text: Product was installed professionally and Work Good, I have not had any issues with it. Just got on line to order another one for another car but its unavailable currently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Installed in our Honda Pilot for our granddaughter. Great picture and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stratos

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: When it was installed it’d power on but wouldn’t accept DVD’s its total garbage. Every troubleshoot was a fail. Totally worthless. Don’t bother buying.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: What a life saver. Enjoying much more peaceful car rides since purchasing this!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, makes road trips possible with 2 little ones, headphones works great. Be sure not to connect acc wire direct to battery, even if your dome light automatically shut off if left on, after 2 days it killed my battery, needed to connect acc wire to an acc circuit.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality picture
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price, fast shipping. Went to Best Buy to have it installed for $200. But they couldn't do it for 2 weeks so I did it myself and turned out great. Awesome unit works great
customer_reviews.author: glenn shute

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This unit was easy to install. It also has a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these for my Chrysler Minivan about a year ago. Definitely didn’t need two. It’s a pretty big screen. We have four sets of headphones now & they all work interchangeably which is nice. One of our headphones got stepped on & broke. It was so easy to replace & have it work perfect. The sound is great through the headphones. No issues at all. I’m really happy with this purchase. I don’t have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Had this dvd player installed in my van, it worked great at first, then suddenly stopped working. Wont even power on, had it dismounted and connections checked, everything was connected just fine. The unit just seems to have crapped out. We are very disappointed this dvd player didn't last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

product_meta.title: Rockville RVD12HD-GR 12" Grey Flip Down Car Monitor DVD/USB/SD Player+Headphones
feature_bullets: Package Includes : Rockville RVD12HD-GR 12" Grey Flip Down Monitor With USB, SD, DVD Player and Video Games + (2) Rockville RFH3 Dual Channel Wireless Ir Headphones

Rockville RVD12HD-GR 12" Grey Flip Down Monitor DVD Player, with USB and Video Games. Screen Size: 12“ . Digital Panel with High Resolution: 800 x 480. Built-in slot-loading DVD player with anti-skip mechanism. Disk slot supports DVD, CD, MP3, VCD, CD-R, CD-RW, MP4, DVD-RW, DVD-R, DVD+RW, DVD-9. Overhead console with two super bright LED dome lights. Native 32 bit game disc included (300 games). Dual channel IR transmitter for wireless headphone connection.

Multi-language OSD (On-Screen Display). USB 2.0 input (Up to 16GB). SD Card slot (up to 16GB). USB and SD supports: MPEG4, VOB, DIVX, AVI, MPG, DAT, MP3, MP4, JPEG, WMV, WMA. Types of supported cards: SD, MMC, MS Card, U plate. (2) A/V inputs. (1) A/V Output. Built-in wireless FM Transmitter with new technology using 87.7-107.9 Mhz. Multi system: NTSC/PAL auto switching. 16:9 (Wide Screen) Aspect Ratio. Slim and compact design for a sleek looking installation.

Rockville RFH-3 Dual Channel IR Headphones . Foldable design for Travel convenience and easy storage. Comfort control leatherette ear surround. Dual channel function capable (A/B). Improved acoustic performance. 40mm Mylar dome speaker built in. Extended bass response. Impedance: 32 Ohms ±10%. Effective distance: 10 meters (max.)

Light weight design for wearing comfort. Auto muting on headphone. Auto power off when no signal. Specifications: A Frequency range 17-23,000 Hz. A Channel, IR_OUT_L:2.8 MHz. A Channel, IR_OUT_R:2.3MHz. B Channel, IR_OUT_L:3.8 MHz. B Channel, IR_OUT_R:3.8 MHz. B Channel, IR_OUT_R:3.2MHz. Sensitivity 96 dB. Modulation high frequency. Power supply 2X1.5V. Battery R03 (AAA) 48h (Batteries not included). Weight 160 gr. (excl. batteries).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars18 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
